content: संया {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go or proceed together. {@--2@} To go away, depart, walk away; <ls>Bg. 15. 8.</ls> {@--3@} To go to, go or enter into; तथा शरीराणि विहाय जीर्णान्यन्यानि संयाति नवानि देही <ls>Bg. 2. 22.</ls> {@--4@} To reach or attain to. {@--5@} To assemble, meet. {@--6@} To fight. {@--7@} To be directed towards, aim at.
